name: 江振維
objective:
本課程主要在帶領工業設計學生以設計思考為核心，進一步探討如何將人機互動介面設計當中，硬體程式設計與感測技術應用於設計專題當中。
This course is designed for under graduate students of industry design. And the core of this course is based on design thinking. Thinking about how to apply hardware, sensors, on the design projects.
